definition: an undergarment covering chest and abdomen
pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)
pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)

sentences.english: The coat has two pockets on each side.
sentences.chinese: 這件外衣的兩側各有一個小兜兜。

sentences.english: And maybe I can borrow it some time and try it out.
sentences.chinese: 也許什麼時候我能向你借來兜兜風。

sentences.english: They were walking around the maze-like arcade and were led to my studio by a surge of positive energy which they could not explain.
sentences.chinese: 他們在商場兜兜轉轉地追尋一股特別的能量而來的。

sentences.english: The weather is so nice that I want to go for a drive.
sentences.chinese: 天氣很棒，我想開車出去兜兜風。

sentences.english: Shall we go for a ridden a car?
Or maybe a bike ride around the block tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 亦或是明天騎腳踏車在住家附近兜兜風？

sentences.english: Well, why don't you come with me to my town tomorrow morning?
sentences.chinese: 行，明早跟我去城裏兜兜吧。

sentences.english: You have to take me for a ride.
I was flying in ever-diminishing circles.
sentences.chinese: 我在一個越來越小的圈子裏兜兜轉轉。

sentences.english: Someone who loves me very much went to NEW YORK and got me this Bib.
sentences.chinese: 一個非常愛我的人去了趟紐約，並帶給我這個圍兜兜。

sentences.english: I just want to drive around town and check out the main strip.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想開車在城裏兜兜風，看看主要街道。

sentences.english: Red Dust's how many stories going round and round edge is not due to see through.
sentences.chinese: 紅塵的幾多故事，兜兜轉轉，緣因都是未能看透。

sentences.english: Shall we go for a drive in the city?
sentences.chinese: 我們開車在城裏兜兜風好嗎？

definition: (pet name for a baby or small child)
to sound like a broken record/to prattle/to nag/to mutter
paws (of small animal)/same as 爪子/legs of furniture or apparatus/stupid person
auntie, youngest of sisters in mother's family
